import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form,Modal,Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { connect } from "react-redux" import {TraderWithdraw} from '../../redux/Action' import SimpleReactValidator from 'simple-react-validator'; class Withdraw extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { amount: '', payment_option:'', acc_no:'', email:'', phone:'', show:false } this.validator = new SimpleReactValidator() } changeHandler = event => { //event.preventDefault() this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } onsubmit=async (event)=>{ event.preventDefault() await this.props.TraderDeposit(this.state.amount,this.props.AuthUser.id) this.setState({show:true}) } render() { const PaymentSwitch=()=>{ switch(this.state.payment_option){ case 'M-PESA': return( ) case 'paypal': return( ) default: return( ) } } return (

) } } const mapStateToProps=(state)=>{ return{ AuthUser:state.Auth.user, Token:state.Auth.token , bal:state.Auth.trader_acc_balance } } const mapDispatchToProps={ TraderWithdraw } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Withdraw)
